alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Davison; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 10:40AM MDT until April 11 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR PARTS OF SOUTH CENTRAL AND SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA... * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota...Fire weather zone 050 Gregory, Fire weather zone 057 Brule, Fire weather zone 058 Aurora, Fire weather zone 059 Davison, Fire weather zone 063 Charles Mix, Fire weather zone 064 Douglas, Fire weather zone 065 Hutchinson, Fire weather zone 068 Bon Homme, and Fire weather zone 069 Yankton. * WIND...Southwesterly sustained winds at 10 to 20 mph with occasional gusts to 25 to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...Lowest relative humidity of 15 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Davison; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton
